 31010 0000287B B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31011 0000287E CD21                    	int	21h
 31012 00002880 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31013                                  
 31014                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31015                                  	;dec	ax
 31016                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31017                                  	;
 31018                                  PrepareMark:
 31019 00002882 1E                      	push	ds
 31020 00002883 48                      	dec	ax
 31021 00002884 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31022 00002886 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31023 0000288C C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31024 00002892 40                      	inc	ax
 31025 00002893 1F                      	pop	ds
 31026                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31027                                  	; ds = cs
 31028                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31029                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31030                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31031 00002894 891E[F31E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31032 00002898 A3[F11E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31033 0000289B A3[F51E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31034                                  	;
 31035                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31036                                  	; cf=0
 31037                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31038 0000289E C3                      	retn
 31039                                  gufd_err:
 31040 0000289F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31041                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31042                                  	; ds = cs
 31043                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31044                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31045                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31046 000028A1 A3[F31E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31047 000028A4 A3[F11E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31048 000028A7 A3[F51E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31049 000028AA F9                      	stc
 31050 000028AB C3                      	retn
 31051                                  
 31052                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31053                                  ;
 31054                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31055                                  ;
 31056                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31057                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31058                                  ;
 31059                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31060                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31061                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31062                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31063                                  ;
 31064                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31065                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31066                                  ;
 31067                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31068                                  
 31069                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31070                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31071                                  
 31072                                  DevSetMark:
 31073 000028AC 06                      	push	es
 31074 000028AD 57                      	push	di
 31075 000028AE 1E                      	push	ds
 31076 000028AF 56                      	push	si
 31077 000028B0 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31078 000028B2 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31079 000028B8 40                      	inc	ax
 31080 000028B9 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31081                                  
 31082                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31083                                  
 31084 000028BD 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31085 000028BE 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31086                                  
 31087 000028C3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31088 000028C5 FC                      	cld
 31089                                  dsm_again:
 31090 000028C6 AC                      	lodsb
 31091 000028C7 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31092 000028C9 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31093 000028CB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31094 000028CD EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31095                                  isit_slash:
 31096 000028CF 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31097 000028D1 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31098 000028D3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31099 000028D5 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31100                                  isit_null:
 31101 000028D7 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31102 000028D9 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31103 000028DB 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31104                                  
 31105 000028DD BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31106 000028E0 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31107                                  dsm_next_char:
 31108 000028E3 AC                      	lodsb
 31109 000028E4 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31110 000028E6 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31111 000028E8 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31112 000028EA 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31113 000028EC AA                      	stosb
 31114 000028ED E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31115                                  blankout:
 31116 000028EF E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31117 000028F1 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31118 000028F3 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31119                                  dsm_exit:
 31120 000028F5 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31121 000028F6 5E                      	pop	si
 31122 000028F7 1F                      	pop	ds
 31123 000028F8 5F                      	pop	di
 31124 000028F9 07                      	pop	es
 31125 000028FA C3                      	retn
 31126                                  
 31127                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31128                                  ;
 31129                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31130                                  ;
 31131                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31132                                  ;
 31133                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31134                                  ;
 31135                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31136                                  ;	in DevSize
 31137                                  ;
 31138                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31139                                  
 31140                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31141                                  SizeDevice:
 31142                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31143                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31144 000028FB 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31145 000028FC 06                      	push	es
 31146 000028FD 1F                      	pop	ds
 31147 000028FE 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31148 00002900 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31149 00002903 CD21                    	int	21h
 31150 00002905 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31151                                  
 31152 00002907 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31153 00002909 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31154 0000290C 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31155 0000290E 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31156 00002910 CD21                    	int	21h
 31157 00002912 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31158 00002914 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31159 00002917 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31160 0000291A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31161 0000291E 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31162 00002920 2EC706[E21E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31163                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31164 00002927 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31165                                  szdev1:
 31166 00002929 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31167 0000292B D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31168 0000292D B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31169 0000292F D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31170 00002931 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31171                                  	;
 31172                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31173 00002933 2E3B06[001F]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31174                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31175                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31176 00002938 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 31177 0000293A 2EA1[001F]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31178                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31179 0000293E F8                      	clc
 31180                                  szdev2:
 31181 0000293F 2EA3[E21E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31182                                  
 31183                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31184                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31185                                  	; cf=0
 31186                                  	;clc
 31187                                  sd_close:
 31188 00002943 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 31189                                  					;  carry flag
 31190 00002944 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31191 00002947 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31192 00002949 9D                      	popf
 31193                                  sd_err:
 31194                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31195                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31196 0000294A 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 31197 0000294B C3                      	retn

 31508                                  ;
 31509                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31510                                  ;
 31511                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31512                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31513                                  ;
 31514                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31515                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31516                                  ;
 31517                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31518                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31519                                  ;
 31520                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31521                                  
 31522                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31523                                  
 31524                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31525                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31526                                  GetHexNum:
 31527 00002A2F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31528 00002A31 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31529                                  ghn_next:
 31530 00002A33 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31531 00002A36 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31532 00002A39 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31533 00002A3B 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31534 00002A3E 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31535 00002A40 50                      	push	ax
 31536 00002A41 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31537 00002A43 E83706                  	call	delim
 31538 00002A46 58                      	pop	ax
 31539                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31540 00002A47 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31541 00002A4A 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31542 00002A4C E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31543                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31544                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31545 00002A4F 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31546                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31547                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31548                                  ghn_shift1:
 31549 00002A51 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31550 00002A53 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31551 00002A55 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31552 00002A57 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31553 00002A59 46                      	inc	si
 31554 00002A5A EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31555                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31556 00002A5C 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31557 00002A5F 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31558 00002A62 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31559 00002A66 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31560                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31561                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31562                                  ghn_shift2:
 31563 00002A68 F8                      	clc
 31564 00002A69 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31565 00002A6B D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31566 00002A6D E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31567 00002A6F F8                      	clc
 31568 00002A70 C3                      	retn
 31569                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31570                                  ghn_err:
 31571                                  gnib_err:
 31572 00002A71 F9                      	stc
 31573                                  ghn_ret:
 31574                                  gnib_ret:
 31575 00002A72 C3                      	retn
 31576

 31579                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 31580                                  ;
 31581                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 31582                                  ;
 31583                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 31584                                  ;
 31585                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 31586                                  ;
 31587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31588                                  
 31589                                  GetNibble:
 31590 00002A73 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 31591                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 31592                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31593 00002A76 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 31594 00002A78 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 31595 00002A7B 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 31596 00002A7D 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 31597 00002A80 C3                      	retn
 31598                                  is_it_hex:
 31599 00002A81 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 31600                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 31601                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31602 00002A84 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 31603 00002A86 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 31604 00002A89 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 31605 00002A8B 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 31606 00002A8E C3                      	retn
 31607                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31608                                  ;gnib_err:
 31609                                  ;	stc
 31610                                  ;gnib_ret:
 31611                                  ;	retn

 31665 00002AAB 8C06[0E1F]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 31666 00002AAF B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 31667 00002AB2 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 31668                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr],bx	; get XMS driver address
 31669                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 31670 00002AB4 891E[F71E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 31671 00002AB8 8C06[F91E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 31672                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31673 00002ABC 803E[0D1F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 31674                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 31675                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it

 31678 00002AC3 E83401                  	call	LinkFirstUMB		; else link the first UMB
 31679                                  	;jc	short iau_err
 31680                                  	; 12/12/2022

 31683                                  	; ds = cs
 31684 00002AC8 C606[0D1F]FF            	mov	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked

 31686                                  ia_1:

 31696                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31697                                  ;
 31698                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 31699                                  ;
 31700                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 31701                                  ;
 31702                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 31703                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 31704                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 31705                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 31706                                  ;				NC
 31707                                  ;			  else 
 31708                                  ;				CY
 31709                                  ;
 31710                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 31711                                  ;
 31712                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31713                                  
 31714                                  umb_allocate:
 31715                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31716                                  	; ds = cs
 31717 00002AD0 50                      	push	ax
 31718 00002AD1 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 31719 00002AD3 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 31720                                  					;   possible
 31721                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31722 00002AD6 FF1E[F71E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 31723                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 31724                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 31725                                  					; the largest UMB
 31726 00002ADA 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 31727 00002ADC 740D                    	jz	short ua_err
 31728                                  	
 31729 00002ADE B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 31730                                  
 31731                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31732 00002AE0 FF1E[F71E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 31733                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 31734                                  
 31735 00002AE4 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 31736 00002AE7 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 31737                                  	;clc
 31738                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31739                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31740                                  	; cf=0
 31741                                  	;clc 
 31742                                  ua_done:
 31743 00002AE9 58                      	pop	ax
 31744 00002AEA C3                      	retn
 31745                                  ua_err:
 31746 00002AEB F9                      	stc
 31747 00002AEC EBFB                    	jmp	short ua_done
 31748                                  
 31749                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31750                                  ;
 31751                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 31752                                  ;
 31753                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 31754                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 31755                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 31756                                  ;			; DS = data
 31757                                  ;
 31758                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 31759                                  ;
 31760                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 31761                                  ;
 31762                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31763                                  
 31764                                  umb_insert:
 31765 00002AEE 1E                      	push	ds
 31766                                  
 31767                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31768                                  	; ds = cs
 31769                                  
 31770                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 31771 00002AEF 8E1E[0E1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 31772                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 31773 00002AF3 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 31774 00002AF7 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 31775 00002AF9 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31776                                  ui_next:
 31777 00002AFB 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 31778                                  					;    new block
 31779 00002AFD 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 31780                                  					; Q: is current block the
 31781                                  					;    last
 31782 00002AFF 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31783 00002B05 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 31784                                  					; N: get next block
 31785 00002B07 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 31786                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 31787 00002B09 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31788 00002B0C EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 31789                                  
 31790                                  ui_insert:
 31791 00002B0E 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 31792 00002B10 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 31793                                  
 31794 00002B11 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 31795 00002B13 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 31796                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 31797 00002B15 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31798                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 31799 00002B1A C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31800                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 31801 00002B20 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 31802                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 31803 00002B24 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31804                                  
 31805                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 31806                                  
 31807 00002B2A 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 31808 00002B2C 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31809 00002B32 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 31810                                  					; mark as free
 31811 00002B39 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 31812                                  					; start & end of new block
 31813 00002B3C 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 31814                                  
 31815                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 31816                                  	
 31817 00002B41 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 31818 00002B43 43                      	inc	bx
 31819 00002B44 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 31820 00002B46 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 31821                                  
 31822                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 31823                                  					; this block
 31824 00002B47 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 31825                                  	
 31826 00002B49 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31827 00002B4F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31828 00002B56 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31829 00002B5A 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31830                                  
 31831 00002B61 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 31832                                  
 31833                                  ui_append:
 31834                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 31835 00002B63 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 31836 00002B68 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 31837                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 31838                                  					; block for the next arena.
 31839                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31840 00002B6E 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31841                                  
 31842 00002B74 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 31843 00002B76 40                      	inc	ax
 31844 00002B77 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 31845                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 31846 00002B79 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 31847                                  
 31848 00002B7B 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 31849                                  
 31850 00002B7D 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31851 00002B83 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31852 00002B8A 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31853 00002B8E 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 31854                                  
 31855                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 31856 00002B95 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 31857 00002B97 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31858 00002B9D 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 31859                                  					; mark as free
 31860 00002BA4 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 31861 00002BA5 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 31862                                  ui_done:
 31863                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 31864 00002BAA 1F                      	pop	ds
 31865                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 31866                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 31867 00002BAB C3                      	retn
 31868                                  
 31869                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31870                                  
 31871                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31872                                  ;
 31873                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 31874                                  ;
 31875                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 31876                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 31877                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 31878                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 31879                                  ;
 31880                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 31881                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 31882                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 31883                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 31884                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 31885                                  ;
 31886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31887                                  
 31888                                  umb_coalesce:
 31889                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31890                                  	; ds = cs
 31891 00002BAC 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 31892                                  
 31893 00002BAD 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 31894                                  
 31895                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 31896                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31897 00002BAF 8E06[0E1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 31898 00002BB3 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 31899                                  uc_nextfree:
 31900 00002BB8 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 31901 00002BBA 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31902                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 31903 00002BBC 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 31904 00002BC1 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 31905                                  					; N: get next arena
 31906 00002BC3 E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 31907 00002BC6 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 31908 00002BC8 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 31909                                  uc_again:
 31910 00002BCA E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 31911 00002BCD 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 31912                                  uc_check:
 31913 00002BCF 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 31914 00002BD4 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 31915                                  					; Y: coalesce
 31916 00002BD6 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 31917 00002BDB 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 31918                                  	;add	[3],cx
 31919 00002BDC 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 31920 00002BE0 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 31921 00002BE3 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 31922 00002BE5 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 31923                                  
 31924                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31925                                  ;uc_done:
 31926                                  	;retn
 31927                                  
 31928                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31929                                  ;
 31930                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 31931                                  ;
 31932                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 31933                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 31934                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 31935                                  ;
 31936                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31937                                  
 31938                                  	; 01/11/2022
 31939                                  get_next:
 31940 00002BE7 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31941 00002BEC 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 31942                                  _get_next_:
 31943 00002BEE 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 31944 00002BF0 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 31945 00002BF4 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 31946 00002BF5 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31947                                  	;clc
 31948                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31949                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31950                                  	; cf=0
 31951                                  	;clc
 31952 00002BF7 C3                      	retn
 31953                                  gn_err:
 31954 00002BF8 F9                      	stc
 31955                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 31956                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 31957 00002BF9 C3                      	retn
 31958                                  
 31959                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31960                                  ;
 31961                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 31962                                  ;
 31963                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31964                                  
 31965                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31966                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 31967                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 31968                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31969                                  	; ds = cs
 31970 00002BFA E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 31971 00002BFD 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 31972                                  
 31973                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 31974                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 31975                                  
 31976                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31977                                  	; ds = cs
 31978                                  
 31979 00002BFF CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 31980 00002C01 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 31981 00002C03 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 31982                                  
 31983 00002C05 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 31984 00002C07 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 31985                                  
 31986 00002C09 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 31987                                  
 31988 00002C0B 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 31989 00002C0E 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 31990                                  	
 31991 00002C10 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31992 00002C16 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31993                                  					
 31994 00002C1D 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31995 00002C21 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31996                                  
 31997                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 31998                                  
 31999 00002C28 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32000 00002C2A 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32001 00002C30 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32002                                  					; mark as free 
 32003 00002C37 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32004 00002C38 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32005                                  
 32006                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32007                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32008 00002C3D 8E06[0E1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32009 00002C41 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32010 00002C44 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32011                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32012                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32013                                  
 32014                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32015                                  
 32016 00002C47 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32017 00002C4A 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32018 00002C4D 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32019                                  ;scan_next
 32020                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32021                                  scannext:
 32022 00002C4F 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32023 00002C53 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32024                                  	
 32025 00002C55 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32026 00002C57 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32027 00002C5C 40                      	inc	ax
 32028 00002C5D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32029                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32030                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32031 00002C5F EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32032                                  got_last:
 32033 00002C61 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32034 00002C67 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32035                                  	;clc
 32036                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32037                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32038                                  	; cf=0
 32039                                  	;clc
 32040 00002C6D C3                      	retn
 32041                                  
 32042                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32043                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32044                                  ;	;stc
 32045                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32046                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32047                                  ;	; cf=1
 32048                                  ;	;stc
 32049                                  ;	retn
 32050                                  
 32051                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32052                                  ;
 32053                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32054                                  ;
 32055                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32056                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32057                                  ;
 32058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32059                                  
 32060                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32061                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32062                                  	; ds = cs
 32063 00002C6E 833E[F11E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32064                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32065 00002C73 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32066 00002C75 06                      	push	es
 32067 00002C76 53                      	push	bx
 32068                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32069                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32070                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32071                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32072 00002C77 8B1E[F51E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32073 00002C7B 2B1E[F11E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32074 00002C7F 8E06[F11E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32075                                  	
 32076 00002C83 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32077 00002C86 CD21                    	int	21h
 32078                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32079                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32080                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32081 00002C88 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32082 00002C8A 48                      	dec	ax
 32083 00002C8B 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32084 00002C8D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32085 00002C94 5B                      	pop	bx
 32086 00002C95 07                      	pop	es
 32087                                  su_exit:
 32088 00002C96 C3                      	retn
 32089                                  
 32090                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32091                                  ;
 32092                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB
 32093                                  ;
 32094                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 32095                                  ;
 32096                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32097                                  
 32098                                  UnlinkUMB:
 32099                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32100                                  	; ds = cs
 32101 00002C97 1E                      	push	ds
 32102 00002C98 06                      	push	es
 32103                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32104 00002C99 803E[0D1F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32105                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32106 00002C9E 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32107                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32108 00002CA0 8E06[0E1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32109                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32110 00002CA4 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32111 00002CA9 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32112                                  ulu_next:
 32113 00002CAE E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32114 00002CB1 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32115 00002CB3 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32116 00002CB5 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32117 00002CB7 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32118 00002CB9 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32119                                  ulu_found:
 32120                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32121 00002CBB C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32122                                  ulu_x:
 32123 00002CC0 07                      	pop	es
 32124 00002CC1 1F                      	pop	ds
 32125 00002CC2 C3                      	retn

 32132                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32133                                  ;
 32134                                  ; Summary:
 32135                                  ;
 32136                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32137                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32138                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32139                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32140                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32141                                  ;
 32142                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32143                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32144                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32145                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32146                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32147                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32148                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32149                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32150                                  ;
 32151                                  ; Example:
 32152                                  ;
 32153                                  ;   [menu]
 32154                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32155                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32156                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32157                                  ;
 32158                                  ;   [network]
 32159                                  ;   include misc
 32160                                  ;   device=foo
 32161                                  ;
 32162                                  ;   [misc]
 32163                                  ;   device=bar
 32164                                  ;   include alternate
 32165                                  ;
 32166                                  ;   [alternate]
 32167                                  ;   device=tar
 32168                                  ;
 32169                                  ;
 32170                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32171                                  ;
 32172                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32173                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32174                                  ;
 32175                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32176                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32177                                  ;   following order:
 32178                                  ;
 32179                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32180                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32181                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32182                                  ;
 32183                                  
 32184                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32185                                  
 32186                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32187                                  
 32188                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32189                                  
 32190                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32191                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32192                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32193                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32194                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32195                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32196                                  
 32197                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32198                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32199                                  
 32200                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32201                                  
 32202                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32203                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32204                                  
 32205 00002CC3 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 32206                                  
 32207                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32208                                  ;
 32209                                  ; procedure : setparms
 32210                                  ;
 32211                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 32212                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 32213                                  ;
 32214                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32215                                  
 32216                                  setparms:
 32217 00002CC4 1E                      	push	ds
 32218 00002CC5 50                      	push	ax
 32219 00002CC6 53                      	push	bx
 32220 00002CC7 51                      	push	cx
 32221 00002CC8 52                      	push	dx
 32222                                  
 32223 00002CC9 0E                      	push	cs
 32224 00002CCA 1F                      	pop	ds
 32225                                  
 32226 00002CCB 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32227 00002CCD 8A1E[8E36]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 32228                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32229 00002CD1 43                      	inc	bx
 32230                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 32231                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 32232 00002CD2 BA[6635]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 32233 00002CD5 B444                    	mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 32234 00002CD7 B00D                    	mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 32235 00002CD9 B508                    	mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 32236 00002CDB B140                    	mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 32237 00002CDD CD21                    	int	21h
 32238                                  
 32239                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32240                                  ;
 32241                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 32242                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 32243                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 32244                                  ;	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32245                                  ;	mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 32246                                  ;
 32247                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32248                                  ;	jz	short not_ec35
 32249                                  
 32250                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32251                                  	;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32252                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32253 00002CDF F606[8F36]04            	test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32254 00002CE4 7411                    	jz	short eot_ok
 32255                                  
 32256                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 32257                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32258 00002CE6 8A0E[8E36]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 32259 00002CEA B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32260 00002CED 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax	
 32261                                  
 32262 00002CEF B001                    	mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 32263 00002CF1 D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 32264                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 32265 00002CF3 0806[3105]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 32266                                  
 32267                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32268                                  ;
 32269                                  ;not_ec35:
 32270                                  ;;	Now adjust the BIOS's EOT variable if our new drive has more
 32271                                  ;;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 32272                                  ;
 32273                                  ;	;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]
 32274                                  ;	mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 32275                                  ;	;cmp	al,[12Ch] ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EB4h)
 32276                                  ;	cmp	al,[EOT]
 32277                                  ;	jbe	short eot_ok
 32278                                  ;	mov	[EOT],al
 32279                                  
 32280                                  eot_ok:
 32281 00002CF7 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 32282 00002CF8 59                      	pop	cx
 32283 00002CF9 5B                      	pop	bx
 32284 00002CFA 58                      	pop	ax
 32285 00002CFB 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 32286 00002CFC C3                      	retn
 32287

 32289                                  ;
 32290                                  ; procedure : diddleback
 32291                                  ;
 32292                                  ; replace default values for further drivparm commands
 32293                                  ;
 32294                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32295                                  
 32296                                  diddleback:
 32297 00002CFD 1E                      	push	ds
 32298 00002CFE 0E                      	push	cs
 32299 00002CFF 1F                      	pop	ds
 32300                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+4],80
 32301 00002D00 C706[6A35]5000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 32302                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+1],2
 32303 00002D06 C606[6735]02            	mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_3INCH720KB ; 2
 32304                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 32305 00002D0B C706[6835]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0
 32306 00002D11 C706[8F36]0000          	mov	word [switches],0	    ; zero all switches
 32307 00002D17 1F                      	pop	ds
 32308 00002D18 C3                      	retn
 32309

 32311                                  %if 0

 32316                                  ;
 32317                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32318                                  ;
 32319                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32320                                  ;
 32321                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32322                                  
 32323                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32324                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32325                                  
 32326                                  parseline:
 32327                                  	push	ds
 32328                                  
 32329                                  	push	cs
 32330                                  	pop	ds
 32331                                  
 32332                                  nextswtch:
 32333                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32334                                  	je	short done_line
 32335                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32336                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32337                                  
 32338                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32339                                  
 32340                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32341                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32342                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32343                                  	je	short getparm
 32344                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32345                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32346                                  
 32347                                  getparm:
 32348                                  	call	check_switch
 32349                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32350                                  	jc	short swterr
 32351                                  getnext:
 32352                                  	call	getchr
 32353                                  	jc	short done_line
 32354                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32355                                  swterr:
 32356                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32357                                  
 32358                                  done_line:
 32359                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32360                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32361                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32362                                  	jnz	short okay
 32363                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32364                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32365                                  
 32366                                  okay:
 32367                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 32368                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32369                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32370                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32371                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32372                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32373                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32374                                  	; cf=0
 32375                                  	;clc
 32376                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 32377                                  exitpl:
 32378                                  	pop	ds
 32379                                  	retn
 32380                                  put_back:
 32381                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32382                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32383                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32384                                  
 32385                                  %endif
 32386                                  
 32387                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32388                                  ;
 32389                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32390                                  ;
 32391                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32392                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32393                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32394                                  ; error.
 32395                                  ;
 32396                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32397                                  
 32398                                  check_switch:
 32399 00002D19 E817FA                  	call	getchr
 32400                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32401 00002D1C 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32402 00002D1E 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32403 00002D20 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32404                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32405 00002D22 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32406 00002D24 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32407 00002D26 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32408                                  
 32409 00002D28 06                      	push	es
 32410                                  
 32411 00002D29 0E                      	push	cs
 32412 00002D2A 07                      	pop	es
 32413                                  
 32414 00002D2B 8A0E[2237]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32415 00002D2F B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32416 00002D31 BF[2337]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32417 00002D34 F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32418                                  
 32419 00002D36 07                      	pop	es
 32420 00002D37 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32421                                  
 32422 00002D39 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32423 00002D3C D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32424 00002D3E 8B1E[8F36]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32425 00002D42 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32426 00002D44 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32427                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32428 00002D46 A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32429                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32430 00002D48 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 32431                                  
 32432 00002D4A E8E6F9                  	call	getchr
 32433 00002D4D 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 32434                                  
 32435 00002D4F 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32436 00002D51 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 32437                                  
 32438 00002D53 E8DDF9                  	call	getchr
 32439 00002D56 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32440                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32441                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 32442                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32443                                  	; ds = cs
 32444 00002D57 C606[2A03]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 32445 00002D5C E8D803                  	call	getnum
 32446                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 32447                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32448 00002D5F C606[2A03]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 32449 00002D64 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 32450                                  
 32451                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32452                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32453                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 32454                                  
 32455 00002D65 E80500                  	call	process_num
 32456                                  
 32457                                  done_swtch:
 32458                                  	;clc
 32459                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32460                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32461                                  	; cf=0
 32462                                  	;clc
 32463 00002D68 C3                      	retn
 32464                                  
 32465                                  err_swtch:
 32466 00002D69 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 32467                                  err_check:
 32468 00002D6B F9                      	stc
 32469                                  err_chk:
 32470 00002D6C C3                      	retn
 32471                                  
 32472                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32473                                  ;
 32474                                  ; procedure : process_num
 32475                                  ;
 32476                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 32477                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 32478                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 32479                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 32480                                  ;
 32481                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32482                                  
 32483                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32484                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 32485                                  process_num:
 32486 00002D6D 850E[8F36]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 32487 00002D71 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 32488                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32489 00002D73 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 32490                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 32491 00002D76 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 32492 00002D78 A2[8E36]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 32493                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32494                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32495                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32496                                  	; cf=0
 32497 00002D7B C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32498                                  try_f:
 32499                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32500 00002D7C F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 32501                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 32502 00002D7F 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 32503                                  
 32504                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 32505                                  
 32506                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 32507 00002D81 A2[6735]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 32508                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32509                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32510                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32511                                  	; cf=0
 32512 00002D84 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32513                                  try_t:
 32514 00002D85 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 32515 00002D87 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 32516                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32517 00002D89 F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 32518                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 32519 00002D8C 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 32520                                  
 32521                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax
 32522 00002D8E A3[6A35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 32523                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32524                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32525                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32526                                  	; cf=0
 32527 00002D91 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32528                                  try_s:
 32529                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32530 00002D92 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 32531                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 32532 00002D95 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 32533 00002D97 A3[8C36]                	mov	[slim],ax
 32534                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32535                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32536                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32537                                  	; cf=0
 32538 00002D9A C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32539                                  
 32540                                  ; must be for number of heads
 32541                                  
 32542                                  try_h:
 32543 00002D9B A3[8A36]                	mov	[hlim],ax
 32544                                  done_ret:
 32545                                  	;clc
 32546                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32547                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32548                                  	; cf=0 (test instruction resets cf)
 32549                                  	;clc
 32550 00002D9E C3                      	retn
 32551                                  
 32552                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 32632 00002DDB C706[8C35]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32633                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
