 32646                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32647                                  ;
 32648                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 32649                                  ;
 32650                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 32651                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 32652                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 32653                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 32654                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 32655                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 32656                                  ;
 32657                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 32658                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 32659                                  ;
 32660                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 32661                                  ;
 32662                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32663                                  
 32664                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32665                                  
 32666                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32667                                  setdeviceparameters:
 32668                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32669                                  	; ds = cs
 32670                                  	
 32671 00002DE1 06                      	push	es
 32672                                  
 32673 00002DE2 0E                      	push	cs
 32674 00002DE3 07                      	pop	es
 32675                                  
 32676 00002DE4 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32677 00002DE6 8A1E[6735]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 32678 00002DEA 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32679 00002DED 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 32680                                  
 32681 00002DEF C706[6A35]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32682                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 32683                                  got_80:
 32684 00002DF5 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 32685 00002DF7 8BB7[0E37]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 32686                                  
 32687                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 32688                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32689 00002DFB BF[6D35]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 32690 00002DFE B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 32691 00002E01 FC                      	cld
 32692                                  	;repe	movsb
 32693                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32694 00002E02 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 32695                                  
 32696 00002E04 07                      	pop	es
 32697                                  
 32698                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32699 00002E05 F606[8F36]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32700                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32701 00002E0A 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 32702                                  
 32703 00002E0C A1[8C36]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 32704                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 32705 00002E0F A3[7A35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 32706                                  
 32707                                  see_heads:
 32708                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32709 00002E12 F606[8F36]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32710                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32711 00002E17 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 32712                                  
 32713 00002E19 A1[8A36]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 32714                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 32715 00002E1C A3[7C35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 32716                                  
 32717                                  heads_not_altered:
 32718                                  
 32719                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 32720                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 32721                                  
 32722                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 32723                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32724                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 32725                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32726 00002E1F B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 32727 00002E22 A2[6F35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 32728                                  
 32729 00002E25 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 32730                                  
 32731                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 32732                                  
 32733                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 32734                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32735 00002E27 8A3E[7735]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 32736                                  
 32737                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32738                                  	; ax = 2
 32739 00002E2B 3906[7C35]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 32740                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 32741 00002E2F 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 32742                                  
 32743 00002E31 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 32744                                  
 32745                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 32746                                  
 32747 00002E33 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 32748                                  
 32749                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 32750                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 32751                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 32752                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 32753                                  
 32754                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 32755                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 32756                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 32757                                  
 32758 00002E35 833E[7A35]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 32759 00002E3A 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 32760 00002E3C 833E[6A35]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 32761 00002E41 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 32762                                  
 32763                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 32764                                  
 32765 00002E43 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32766                                  
 32767                                  ;	check for 320K
 32768                                  
 32769                                  not_144m:
 32770 00002E45 833E[6A35]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32771 00002E4A 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32772 00002E4C 833E[7A35]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32773 00002E51 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32774                                  
 32775 00002E53 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 32776 00002E55 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 32777                                  
 32778                                  only_one_head:
 32779                                  
 32780                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 32781                                  
 32782 00002E57 803E[6735]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32783 00002E5C 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32784                                  
 32785                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 32786                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 32787                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 32788                                  
 32789 00002E5E B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 32790 00002E60 833E[7A35]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32791                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32792 00002E65 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 32793                                  
 32794 00002E67 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 32795                                  
 32796                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 32797                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 32798                                  
 32799                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 32800                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32801                                  	; ax = 2
 32802 00002E69 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 32803 00002E6A A2[6F35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 32804                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 32805                                  
 32806                                  got_correct_mediad:
 32807 00002E6D 881E[7735]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 32808                                  
 32809                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 32810                                  
 32811 00002E71 A1[6A35]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 32812 00002E74 F726[7C35]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 32813 00002E78 F726[7A35]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 32814 00002E7C A3[7535]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 32815 00002E7F F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 32816                                  
 32817 00002E80 C3                      	retn
 32818                                  
 32819                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine

 32840                                  ;;   because we the case of values in SET commands preserved
 32841                                  ;
 32842                                  ;	call	mapcase
 32843                                  ;endif
 32844                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32845 00002E87 E81B02                  	call	mapcase

 32847 00002E8A 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 32848 00002E8C 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32849 00002E8E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32850                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)	
 32851                                  	;;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0

 32857                                  org1:
 32858 00002E93 E8B101                  	call	skip_comment
 32859 00002E96 740D                    	jz	short end_commd_line	; found a comment string and skipped.
 32860 00002E98 E89601                  	call	get2			; not a comment string. then get a char.
 32861 00002E9B 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf ; 0Ah
 32862 00002E9D 7406                    	je	short end_commd_line	; starts with a blank line.
 32863 00002E9F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' ; 20h
 32864 00002EA1 76F0                    	jbe	short org1		; skip leading control characters
 32865 00002EA3 EB0A                    	jmp	short findit
 32866                                  
 32867                                  end_commd_line:
 32868 00002EA5 AA                      	stosb				; store line feed char in buffer for the linecount.
 32869                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset the command level.
 32870                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32871                                  	; ds = cs
 32872 00002EA6 C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 32873 00002EAB EBE6                    	jmp	short org1
 32874                                  
 32875                                  nochar1:
 32876 00002EAD F9                      	stc
 32877 00002EAE C3                      	retn
 32878                                  
 32879                                  findit:
 32880 00002EAF 51                      	push	cx
 32881 00002EB0 56                      	push	si
 32882 00002EB1 57                      	push	di
 32883 00002EB2 89F5                    	mov	bp,si
 32884 00002EB4 4D                      	dec	bp
 32885 00002EB5 BE[D534]                        mov     si,comtab		; prepare to search command table
 32886 00002EB8 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32887                                  findcom:
 32888 00002EBA 89EF                    	mov	di,bp
 32889 00002EBC 8A0C                    	mov	cl,[si]
 32890 00002EBE 46                      	inc	si
 32891 00002EBF E324                    	jcxz	nocom
 32892                                  
 32893                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32894                                  
 32895                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 32896                                  ;
 32897                                  ;;   Simplify future parsing by collapsing ";" onto "REM", and at the same
 32898                                  ;;   time skip the upcoming delimiter test (since ";" need not be followed by
 32899                                  ;;   anything in particular)
 32900                                  ;
 32901                                  ;       cmp     byte [es:di],CONFIG_SEMICOLON  ; ';'
 32902                                  ;       je	short semicolon
 32903                                  ;loopcom:
 32904                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]
 32905                                  ;       inc     di

 32907                                  ;       inc     si                      ; compare to byte @es:di
 32908                                  ;       cmp     al,[si-1]
 32909                                  ;       loope   loopcom
 32910                                  ;;else
 32911                                  ;;	repe	cmpsb
 32912                                  ;endif
 32913                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32914 00002EC1 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 32915                                  
 32916 00002EC3 9F                      	lahf
 32917 00002EC4 01CE                            add     si,cx                   ; bump to next position without affecting flags
 32918 00002EC6 9E                      	sahf
 32919 00002EC7 AC                              lodsb                           ; get indicator letter
 32920 00002EC8 75F0                    	jnz	short findcom
 32921 00002ECA 26803D0D                        cmp     byte [es:di],cr		; the next char might be cr,lf
 32922 00002ECE 7410                    	je	short gotcom0 		; such as in "rem",cr,lf case.
 32923 00002ED0 26803D0A                	cmp	byte [es:di],lf
 32924 00002ED4 740A                    	je	short gotcom0
 32925                                  
 32926                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32927                                  ;

 32931                                  ;

 32933                                  ;       je	short gotcom0
 32934                                  ;;endif
 32935                                  ;	push	ax
 32936                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]		; now the next char. should be a delim.
 32937                                  ;
 32938                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 32939                                  ;
 32940                                  ;;   If keyword is *immediately* followed by a question mark (?), then
 32941                                  ;;   set the high bit of the ASCII command code (CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY) that is
 32942                                  ;;   stored in the CONFIG.SYS memory image.
 32943                                  ;
 32944                                  ;       cmp     al,'?'                  ; explicit interactive command?
 32945                                  ;       jne	short no_query		; no
 32946                                  ;       pop     ax                      ; yes, so retrieve the original code
 32947                                  ;       or      al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ; and set the QUERY bit

 32951                                  ;       jmp     short gotcom0
 32952                                  ;no_query:
 32953                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG

 32956 00002ED6 50                      	push	ax
 32957 00002ED7 268A05                  	mov	al,[es:di]		; now the next char. should be a delim.
 32958                                  
 32959 00002EDA E8A001                  	call	delim
 32960                                  no_delim:
 32961 00002EDD 58                      	pop	ax
 32962 00002EDE 75DA                    	jnz	short findcom
 32963                                  gotcom0:
 32964 00002EE0 5F                      	pop	di
 32965 00002EE1 5E                      	pop	si
 32966 00002EE2 59                      	pop	cx
 32967 00002EE3 EB0F                    	jmp	short gotcom
 32968                                  nocom:

 32970 00002EE6 5E                      	pop	si
 32971 00002EE7 59                      	pop	cx
 32972 00002EE8 B05A                            mov     al,CONFIG_UNKNOWN  ; 'Z'
 32973 00002EEA AA                      	stosb				; save indicator char.
 32974                                  _skipline:
 32975 00002EEB E84301                  	call	get2
 32976 00002EEE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf ; 0Ah		; skip this bad command line
 32977 00002EF0 75F9                            jne     short _skipline
 32978 00002EF2 EBB1                    	jmp	short end_commd_line	; handle next command line
 32979                                  gotcom:
 32980 00002EF4 AA                              stosb                           ; save indicator char in buffer
 32981                                  
 32982                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32983                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 32984                                  ;

 32986                                  ;;   it screws up the direct comparisons below.

 32989                                  ;;endif

 32995                                  ;;   ([) and the name of block (eg, [menu]), therefore skip this delimiter
 32996                                  ;;   skipping code

 33008                                  ;       call    mapcase                 ; map case of rest of line to UPPER

 33101 00002F5B 7457                    	je	short end_file_slash ; this will be the special case.
 33102                                  
 33103 00002F5D AA                      	stosb			; save the char. in buffer
 33104 00002F5E E81C01                  	call	delim
 33105 00002F61 7459                    	jz	short end_copy_file
 33106                                  
 33107 00002F63 3C20                    	cmp	al, ' '
 33108 00002F65 77EA                    	ja	short org_copy_file ; keep copying
 33109 00002F67 EB53                    	jmp	short end_copy_file ; otherwise, assume end of the filename.
 33110                                  
 33111                                  get_cmt_token:			; get the token. just max. 2 char.
 33112 00002F69 E8C500                  	call	get2
 33113 00002F6C 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '		; skip white spaces or "=" char.
 33114 00002F6E 74F9                    	je	short get_cmt_token ; (we are allowing the other special
 33115 00002F70 3C09                    	cmp	al,tab ; 9 	;  characters can used for comment id.
 33116 00002F72 74F5                    	je	short get_cmt_token ;  character.)
 33117 00002F74 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='		; = is special in this case.
 33118 00002F76 74F1                    	je	short get_cmt_token
 33119 00002F78 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 33120 00002F7A 7426                    	je	short get_cmt_end ; cannot accept the carriage return
 33121 00002F7C 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 33122 00002F7E 7422                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 33123                                  
 33124                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33125                                  	; ds = cs
 33126                                  	;mov	[cs:cmmt1],al	; store it
 33127                                  	;mov	byte [cs:cmmt],1 ; 1 char. so far.
 33128 00002F80 A2[CE03]                	mov	[cmmt1],al	; store it
 33129 00002F83 C606[CD03]01            	mov	byte [cmmt],1 ; 1 char. so far.
 33130 00002F88 E8A600                  	call	get2
 33131 00002F8B 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' ; 20h
 33132 00002F8D 7413                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 33133 00002F8F 3C09                    	cmp	al,tab ; 9
 33134 00002F91 740F                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 33135 00002F93 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr  ; 0Dh
 33136 00002F95 740B                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 33137 00002F97 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf  ; 0Ah
 33138 00002F99 740E                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33139                                  
 33140                                  	;mov	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33141                                  	;inc	byte [cs:cmmt]
 33142                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33143 00002F9B A2[CF03]                	mov	[cmmt2],al
 33144 00002F9E FE06[CD03]              	inc	byte [cmmt]
 33145                                  
 33146                                  get_cmt_end:
 33147 00002FA2 E88C00                  	call	get2
 33148 00002FA5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 33149 00002FA7 75F9                    	jne	short get_cmt_end	; skip it.
 33150                                  end_commd_line_brdg: 
 33151 00002FA9 E9F9FE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		; else jmp to end_commd_line
 33152                                  
 33153                                  org_put_zero:				; make the filename in front of
 33154 00002FAC 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		;  the comment string to be an asciiz.
 33155 00002FB0 47                      	inc	di
 33156 00002FB1 E9F1FE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		;  (maybe null if device=/*)
 33157                                  
 33158                                  end_file_slash: 			; al = "/" option char.
 33159 00002FB4 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		; make a filename an asciiz
 33160 00002FB8 47                      	inc	di			; and
 33161 00002FB9 AA                      	stosb				; store "/" after that.
 33162 00002FBA EB1A                    	jmp	short org5		; continue with the rest of the line
 33163                                  
 33164                                  end_copy_file:
 33165 00002FBC 26C645FF00              	mov	byte [es:di-1],0	; make it an asciiz and handle the next char.
 33166 00002FC1 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 33167 00002FC3 74E4                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33168 00002FC5 EB0F                    	jmp	short org5
 33169                                  
 33170                                  org4:					; org4 skips all delimiters after the command name except for '/'
 33171 00002FC7 E87D00                  	call	skip_comment
 33172 00002FCA 74DD                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33173                                  
 33174 00002FCC E86200                  	call	get2
 33175 00002FCF E8B300                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)
 33176 00002FD2 74F3                    	jz	short org4
 33177 00002FD4 EB08                    	jmp	short org51
 33178                                  
 33179                                  org5:					; rest of the line
 33180 00002FD6 E86E00                  	call	skip_comment		; comment?
 33181 00002FD9 74CE                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33182 00002FDB E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 33183                                  
 33184                                  org51:
 33185 00002FDE AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 33186 00002FDF 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 33187 00002FE1 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 33188 00002FE3 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 33189 00002FE5 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 33190                                  					; M051 - Start
 33191                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33192                                  	; ds = cs
 33193 00002FE7 803E[D003]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 33194                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 33195 00002FEC 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 33196 00002FEE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 33197 00002FF0 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 33198 00002FF2 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 33199 00002FF4 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 33200 00002FF6 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 33201 00002FFB AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 33202 00002FFC FE06[C32C]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 33203                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 33204                                  					; inserted
 33205 00003000 EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 33206                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 33207                                  
 33208 00003002 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 33209 00003004 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 33210 00003006 EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 33211                                  
 33212                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 33213                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33214                                  	; ds = cs
 33215 00003008 803E[C32C]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 33216                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 33217 0000300D 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 33218 0000300F 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 33219 00003014 AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 33220                                  					; M051 - End
 33221                                  org1_brdg:
 33222 00003015 C606[C32C]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 33223                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 33224                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 33225 0000301A E976FE                  	jmp	org1
 33226                                  
 33227                                  at_quote:
 33228 0000301D 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33229                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 33230 00003022 7407                    	je	short up_level
 33231                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 33232 00003024 C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 33233 00003029 EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 33234                                  
 33235                                  up_level:

 33237 0000302B FE06[CC03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 33238 0000302F EBA5                    	jmp	short org5

 33240                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33241                                  ;
 33242                                  ; procedure : get2
 33243                                  ;
 33244                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33245                                  
 33246                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33247                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 33248                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33249                                  get2:
 33250 00003031 E304                    	jcxz	noget
 33251                                  	;
 33252                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33253                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 33254                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33255 00003033 26                      	es	
 33256 00003034 AC                      	lodsb
 33257                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 33258                                  	;inc	si
 33259                                  	;
 33260 00003035 49                      	dec	cx
 33261 00003036 C3                      	retn
 33262                                  noget:
 33263 00003037 59                      	pop	cx
 33264                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33265                                  	; ds = cs
 33266                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 33267                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 33268 00003038 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 33269 0000303C 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 33270 00003040 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 33271                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 33272 00003042 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 33273                                  
 33274                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33275                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 33276                                  ;;	retn
 33277                                  ;;else
 33278                                  ;

 33280                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 33281                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 33282                                  ;
 33283                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 33284                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 33285                                  ;;endif

 33288 00003046 C3                      	retn

 33290                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33291                                  ;
 33292                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33293                                  ;
 33294                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33295                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33296                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33297                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33298                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33299                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33300                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33301                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33302                                  ;
 33303                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33304                                  
 33305                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33306                                  
 33307                                  skip_comment:
 33308 00003047 E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33309                                  
 33310                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33311                                  	; ds = cs	
 33312                                  
 33313 00003049 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33314                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33315 0000304E 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33316                                  
 33317 00003050 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33318                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33319 00003055 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33320                                  
 33321 00003057 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33322                                  	
 33323 0000305A 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33324                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33325 0000305E 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33326                                  
 33327 00003060 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33328                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33329 00003065 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33330                                  
 33331 00003067 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33332                                  	
 33333 0000306B 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33334                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33335 0000306F 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33336                                  skip_cmmt:
 33337 00003071 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33338 00003073 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33339 00003076 46                      	inc	si
 33340 00003077 49                      	dec	cx
 33341 00003078 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33342 0000307A 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33343                                  no_commt:
 33344 0000307C C3                      	retn

 33347                                  %if 0

 33349                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33350                                  
 33351                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33352                                  ;
 33353                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33354                                  ;
 33355                                  ;   INPUT
 33356                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33357                                  ;
 33358                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33359                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33360                                  ;
 33361                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33362                                  ;       All
 33363                                  ;
 33364                                  ;   HISTORY
 33365                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33366                                  ;
 33367                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33368                                  
 33369                                  kbd_read:
 33370                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33371                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33372                                  
 33373                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33374                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33375                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33376                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33377                                  kbd_loop:
 33378                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33379                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33380                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33381                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33382                                          int     16h             ;
 33383                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33384                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33385                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33386                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33387                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33388                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33389                                  
 33390                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33391                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33392                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33393                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33394                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33395                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33396                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33397                                          int     16h             ;
 33398                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33399                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33400                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33401                                          inc     bx
 33402                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33403                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33404                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33405                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33406                                          int     16h             ;
 33407                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33408                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33409                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33410                                  
 33411                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33412                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33413                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33414                                  	
 33415                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33416                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33417                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33418                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33419                                          call    print
 33420                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33421                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33422                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33423                                  kbd_notf5:
 33424                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33425                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33426                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33427                                  
 33428                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33429                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33430                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33431                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33432                                          call    print           ;
 33433                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33434                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33435                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33436                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33437                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33438                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33439                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33440                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33441                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33442                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33443                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33444                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33445                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33446                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33447                                          retn			;
 33448                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33449                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33450                                          retn			;
 33451                                  
 33452                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33453                                  ;
 33454                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33455                                  ;
 33456                                  ;   INPUT
 33457                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33458                                  ;
 33459                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33460                                  ;       None
 33461                                  ;
 33462                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33463                                  ;       None
 33464                                  ;
 33465                                  ;   HISTORY
 33466                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33467                                  ;
 33468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33469                                  
 33470                                  set_numlock:
 33471                                          push    ax
 33472                                          push    ds
 33473                                          sub     ax,ax
 33474                                          mov     ds,ax
 33475                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33476                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33477                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33478                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33479                                          jmp     short set_done
 33480                                  not_off:
 33481                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33482                                          stc
 33483                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33484                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33485                                  set_done:
 33486                                          pop     ds
 33487                                          pop     ax
 33488                                          retn
 33489                                  
 33490                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33491                                  
 33492                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33493                                  ;
 33494                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33495                                  ;
 33496                                  ;   INPUT
 33497                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33498                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33499                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33500                                  ;
 33501                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33502                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33503                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33504                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33505                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33506                                  ;
 33507                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33508                                  ;       All
 33509                                  ;
 33510                                  ;   NOTES
 33511                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33512                                  ;
 33513                                  ;   HISTORY
 33514                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33515                                  ;
 33516                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33517                                  
 33518                                  menu_check:
 33519                                  
 33520                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 33521                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33522                                  
 33523                                          push    cx              ;
 33524                                          push    si              ;
 33525                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33526                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33527                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33528                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33529                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33530                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33531                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33532                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33533                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33534                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33535                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33536                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33537                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33538                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33539                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33540                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33541                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33542                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33543                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33544                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33545                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33546                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33547                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33548                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33549                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33550                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33551                                          call    get_char        ;
 33552                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33553                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33554                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 33555                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33556                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33557                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 33558                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 33559                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 33560                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 33561                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33562                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 33563                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33564                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 33565                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 33566                                          pop     si              ;
 33567                                          pop     cx              ;
 33568                                  
 33569                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 33570                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 33571                                  
 33572                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33573                                          jnz	short menu_search
 33574                                  ;
 33575                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 33576                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 33577                                  ;
 33578                                          call    kbd_read
 33579                                          jnc	short menu_search
 33580                                          jmp	menu_abort
 33581                                  
 33582                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 33583                                  
 33584                                  menu_search:
 33585                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 33586                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 33587                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 33588                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 33589                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 33590                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 33591                                  
 33592                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 33593                                  
 33594                                  menu_color:
 33595                                          push    cx              ;
 33596                                          push    dx              ;
 33597                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 33598                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 33599                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 33600                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 33601                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 33602                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33603                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 33604                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 33605                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 33606                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 33607                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 33608                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 33609                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 33610                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 33611                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33612                                  check_color:                    ;
 33613                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 33614                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 33615                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 33616                                  set_color:
 33617                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 33618                                          pop     dx              ;
 33619                                          pop     cx              ;
 33620                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 33621                                  
 33622                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 33623                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 33624                                  
 33625                                  menu_found:
 33626                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 33627                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 33628                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 33629                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 33630                                  
 33631                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 33632                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 33633                                  
 33634                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 33635                                  
 33636                                  menu_process:
 33637                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33638                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 33639                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 33640                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 33641                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 33642                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 33643                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 33644                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 33645                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 33646                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 33647                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 33648                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 33649                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 33650                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33651                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 33652                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 33653                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33654                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 33655                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33656                                          stc                     ;
 33657                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 33658                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33659                                  menu_numlock:
 33660                                          call    set_numlock
 33661                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33662                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 33663                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 33664                                  
 33665                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 33666                                  
 33667                                  menu_default:
 33668                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 33669                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 33670                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 33671                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 33672                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 33673                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 33674                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 33675                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 33676                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 33677                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 33678                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 33679                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 33680                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 33681                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 33682                                  timeout_skip:
 33683                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33684                                  
 33685                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 33686                                  
 33687                                  menu_item:
 33688                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 33689                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 33690                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 33691                                          call    srch_block      ;
 33692                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 33693                                          stc                     ;
 33694                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 33695                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 33696                                  
 33697                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 33698                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 33699                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 33700                                  
 33701                                  menu_itemfound:
 33702                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 33703                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 33704                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 33705                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 33706                                  
 33707                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 33708                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 33709                                  ;   description...
 33710                                  
 33711                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 33712                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 33713                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 33714                                          call    skip_token      ;
 33715                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33716                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 33717                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33718                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 33719                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 33720                                  
 33721                                  menu_nextitem:
 33722                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33723                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 33724                                  
 33725                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 33726                                  
 33727                                  menu_getdefault:
 33728                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 33729                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 33730                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 33731                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 33732                                  menu_valid:
 33733                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 33734                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 33735                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 33736                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 33737                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 33738                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 33739                                  menu_chkdefault:
 33740                                          push    bx              ;
 33741                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 33742                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33743                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 33744                                          push    ds              ;
 33745                                          push    es              ;
 33746                                          pop     ds              ;
 33747                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 33748                                          pop     ds              ;
 33749                                          pop     bx              ;
 33750                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 33751                                          inc     bx              ;
 33752                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 33753                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 33754                                  menu_nodefault:
 33755                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 33756                                  menu_setdefault:
 33757                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 33758                                  
 33759                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 33760                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 33761                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 33762                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 33763                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 33764                                  ;   with no timeout)
 33765                                  
 33766                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 33767                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 33768                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 33769                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 33770                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 33771                                  
 33772                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 33773                                  
 33774                                  menu_display:
 33775                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 33776                                          int     10h             ;
 33777                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 33778                                          int     10h             ;
 33779                                          push    es              ;
 33780                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 33781                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 33782                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 33783                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 33784                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 33785                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 33786                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 33787                                          int     10h             ;
 33788                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 33789                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 33790                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 33791                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 33792                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 33793                                  	dec     dl              ;
 33794                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 33795                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 33796                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 33797                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 33798                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 33799                                  menu_clear:
 33800                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 33801                                          pop     es              ;
 33802                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 33803                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 33804                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 33805                                  
 33806                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33807                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 33808                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33809                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 33810                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 33811                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 33812                                          int     10h             ;
 33813                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 33814                                          call    print           ;
 33815                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 33816                                          int     10h             ;
 33817                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 33818                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 33819                                  
 33820                                  menu_nostatus:
 33821                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 33822                                  menu_disploop:
 33823                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 33824                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 33825                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 33826                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 33827                                  
 33828                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 33829                                  
 33830                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 33831                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 33832                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 33833                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33834                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 33835                                          int     10h             ;
 33836                                  
 33837                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 33838                                          call    print           ;
 33839                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 33840                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 33841                                          call    print           ;
 33842                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 33843                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33844                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 33845                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 33846                                  
 33847                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 33848                                  
 33849                                  menu_autoselect:
 33850                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 33851                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 33852                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 33853                                  menu_abort:
 33854                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 33855                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 33856                                  
 33857                                  normal_boot:
 33858                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 33859                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 33860                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 33861                                          sub     si,si           ;
 33862                                          jmp     menu_search
 33863                                  
 33864                                  not_topmenu:
 33865                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 33866                                          jne	short not_submenu
 33867                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 33868                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33869                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 33870                                          mov     si,di           ;
 33871                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 33872                                          jmp     menu_found
 33873                                  
 33874                                  not_submenu:
 33875                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 33876                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33877                                  
 33878                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 33879                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 33880                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 33881                                  
 33882                                  no_selection:
 33883                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 33884                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 33885                                          sub     si,si           ;
 33886                                          push    ds              ;
 33887                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 33888                                          sub     di,di           ;
 33889                                  
 33890                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 33891                                  ;
 33892                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 33893                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 33894                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 33895                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 33896                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 33897                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 33898                                  ;
