 34975                                  ;   INPUT
 34976                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34977                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34978                                  ;
 34979                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34980                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 34981                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 34982                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34983                                  ;
 34984                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34985                                  ;       AX
 34986                                  ;
 34987                                  ;   NOTES
 34988                                  ;       None
 34989                                  ;
 34990                                  ;   HISTORY
 34991                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34992                                  ;
 34993                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34994                                  
 34995                                  skip_line:
 34996                                          call    get_char
 34997                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 34998                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 34999                                          jne	short skip_line
 35000                                  skip_line_done:
 35001                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35002                                          retn
 35003                                  
 35004                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35005                                  ;
 35006                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35007                                  ;
 35008                                  ;   INPUT
 35009                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35010                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35011                                  ;
 35012                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35013                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35014                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35015                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35016                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35017                                  ;
 35018                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35019                                  ;       AX
 35020                                  ;
 35021                                  ;   NOTES
 35022                                  ;       None
 35023                                  ;
 35024                                  ;   HISTORY
 35025                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35026                                  ;
 35027                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35028                                  
 35029                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35030                                  
 35031                                  get_number:
 35032                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35033                                  num_loop:
 35034                                          call    get_char        ;
 35035                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35036                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35037                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35038                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35039                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35040                                          push    ax              ;
 35041                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35042                                          push    dx              ;
 35043                                          mul     bx              ;
 35044                                          pop     dx              ;
 35045                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35046                                          pop     ax              ;
 35047                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35048                                          cbw                     ;
 35049                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35050                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35051                                  
 35052                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35053                                  ;num_done:
 35054                                          ;retn
 35055                                  
 35056                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35057                                  ;
 35058                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35059                                  ;
 35060                                  ;   INPUT
 35061                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35062                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35063                                  ;
 35064                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35065                                  ;       AL == next character
 35066                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35067                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35068                                  ;
 35069                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35070                                  ;       AX
 35071                                  ;
 35072                                  ;   NOTES
 35073                                  ;       None
 35074                                  ;
 35075                                  ;   HISTORY
 35076                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35077                                  ;
 35078                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35079                                  
 35080                                  get_char:
 35081                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35082                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35083                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35084                                  	es	
 35085                                  	lodsb
 35086                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35087                                          retn			;
 35088                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35089                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35090                                  nearby_ret:
 35091                                          retn
 35092                                  
 35093                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35094                                  ;
 35095                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35096                                  ;
 35097                                  ;   INPUT
 35098                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35099                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35100                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35101                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35102                                  ;
 35103                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35104                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35105                                  ;
 35106                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35107                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35108                                  ;
 35109                                  ;   NOTES
 35110                                  ;       None
 35111                                  ;
 35112                                  ;   HISTORY
 35113                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35114                                  ;
 35115                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35116                                  
 35117                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35118                                  query_user:
 35119                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35120                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35121                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35122                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35123                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35124                                  qu_1:
 35125                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35126                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35127                                          push    ax                      ;
 35128                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35129                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35130                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35131                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35132                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35133                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35134                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35135                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35136                                  query_all:
 35137                                  
 35138                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35139                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35140                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35141                                  
 35142                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35143                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35144                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35145                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35146                                  
 35147                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35148                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35149                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35150                                  find_match:                             ;
 35151                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35152                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35153                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35154                                          inc     di                      ;
 35155                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35156                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35157                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35158                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35159                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35160                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35161                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35162                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35163                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35164                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35165                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35166                                          inc     di                      ;
 35167                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35168                                          int     21h                     ;
 35169                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35170                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35171                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35172                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35173                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35174                                  cmd_notset:
 35175                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35176                                  line_print:                             ;
 35177                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35178                                          es
 35179                                  	lodsb
 35180                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35181                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35182                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35183                                  non_null:                               ;
 35184                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35185                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35186                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35187                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35188                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35189                                  non_space:                              ;
 35190                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35191                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35192                                          int     21h                     ;
 35193                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35194                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35195                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35196                                  
 35197                                  generic_prompt:
 35198                                          call    print                   ;
 35199                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35200                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35201                                          int     16h                     ;
 35202                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35203                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35204                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35205                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35206                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35207                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35208                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35209                                  not_func:
 35210                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35211                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35212                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35213                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35214                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35215                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35216                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35217                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35218                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35219                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35220                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35221                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35222                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35223                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35224                                  
 35225                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35226                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35227                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35228                                  	clc
 35229                                  do_cmd:
 35230                                  	pop     ax			;
 35231                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35232                                  	; cf=0
 35233                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35234                                  	retn
 35235                                  
 35236                                  skip_cmd:
 35237                                  	pop     ax			;
 35238                                  skip_all:
 35239                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35240                                  	stc
 35241                                  	retn
 35242                                  
 35243                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35244                                  ;
 35245                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35246                                  ;
 35247                                  ;   INPUT
 35248                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35249                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35250                                  ;
 35251                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35252                                  ;       None
 35253                                  ;
 35254                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35255                                  ;       None
 35256                                  ;
 35257                                  ;   NOTES
 35258                                  ;       None
 35259                                  ;
 35260                                  ;   HISTORY
 35261                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35262                                  ;
 35263                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35264                                  
 35265                                  print_error:
 35266                                          push    ax
 35267                                          push    bx
 35268                                          push    cx
 35269                                          push    dx
 35270                                          push    ds
 35271                                          push    cs
 35272                                          pop     ds
 35273                                          pushf
 35274                                          call    get_linenum
 35275                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35276                                          call    error_line
 35277                                          popf
 35278                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35279                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35280                                          call    print
 35281                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35282                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35283                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35284                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35285                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35286                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35287                                  pe_1:     
 35288                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35289                                          call    print
 35290                                  pe_ret: 
 35291                                  	pop     ds
 35292                                          pop     dx
 35293                                          pop     cx
 35294                                          pop     bx
 35295                                          pop     ax
 35296                                  	retn
 35297                                  
 35298                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35299                                  
 35300                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35301                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35302                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35303                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35304                                  
 35305                                  disable_autoexec:
 35306                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35307                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35308                                  
 35309                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35310                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35311                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35312                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35313                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35314                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35315                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35316                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35317                                  dae_1:
 35318                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35319                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35320                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35321                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35322                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35323                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35324                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35325                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35326                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35327                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35328                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35329                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35330                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35331                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35332                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35333                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35334                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35335                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35336                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35337                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35338                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35339                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35340                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35341                                          retn
 35342                                  
 35343                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35344                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35345                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35346                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35347                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35348                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35349                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 35350                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35351                                  
 35352                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35353                                  
 35354                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35355                                  
 35356                                  
 35357                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35358                                  
 35359                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35360                                  ;
 35361                                  ; procedure : delim
 35362                                  ;
 35363                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35364                                  
 35365                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35366                                  ;
 35367                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35368                                  ;
 35369                                  ;any_delim:
 35370                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35371                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35372                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35373                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35374                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35375                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35376                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35377                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35378                                  ;
 35379                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35380                                  
 35381                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35382                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35383                                  delim:
 35384 0000307D 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35385 0000307F 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35386                                  
 35387 00003081 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35388 00003083 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35389                                  
 35390                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35391 00003085 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35392 00003087 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35393 00003089 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35394 0000308B 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35395 0000308D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35396 0000308F 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35397 00003091 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35398 00003093 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35399 00003095 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35400                                  
 35401                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35402                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35403                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35404                                  ;	clc
 35405                                  ;;endif
 35406                                  
 35407                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35408                                  delim_ret:
 35409 00003097 C3                      	retn
 35410

 35415                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line

 35420 00003098 E898F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 35421 0000309B 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret

 35423 0000309F 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35424 000030A1 E88FF6                  	call	getchr
 35425                                  nl_ret:

 35430                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35431                                  ;
 35432                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35433                                  
 35434                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35435                                  mapcase:
 35436 000030A5 51                      	push	cx
 35437 000030A6 56                      	push	si
 35438 000030A7 1E                      	push	ds
 35439                                  
 35440 000030A8 06                      	push	es
 35441 000030A9 1F                      	pop	ds
 35442                                  
 35443                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35444                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35445                                  ;
 35446                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35447                                  ;;else
 35448                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35449                                  ;;endif
 35450                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35451 000030AA 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35452                                  
 35453                                  convloop:
 35454 000030AC AC                      	lodsb
 35455 000030AD 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35456 000030AF 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35457 000030B1 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35458 000030B3 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35459 000030B5 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35460 000030B7 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35461                                  noconv:
 35462                                  
 35463                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35464                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35465                                  ;;
 35466                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35467                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35468                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35469                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35470                                  ;;
 35471                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35472                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35473                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35474                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35475                                  ;check_eol:
 35476                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35477                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35478                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35479                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35480                                  ;;endif
 35481                                  	
 35482                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35483 000030BA E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35484                                  convdone:
 35485 000030BC 1F                      	pop	ds
 35486 000030BD 5E                      	pop	si
 35487 000030BE 59                      	pop	cx
 35488 000030BF C3                      	retn
 35489                                  
 35490                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35491                                  ;
 35492                                  ; procedure : round
 35493                                  ;
 35494                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35495                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35496                                  ;
 35497                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35498                                  
 35499                                  round:
 35500 000030C0 50                      	push	ax
 35501 000030C1 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35502                                  
 35503 000030C5 E8F1DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35504                                  
 35505 000030C8 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35506 000030CD 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35507 000030D4 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35508 000030D8 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35509 000030DD 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35510 000030DF 2EF606[2E14]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35511 000030E5 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35512 000030E7 06                      	push	es
 35513 000030E8 56                      	push	si
 35514 000030E9 2E8B36[2C14]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35515 000030EE 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35516 000030F0 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35517 000030F2 48                      	dec	ax
 35518                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35519 000030F3 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35520 000030F7 2E8026[2E14]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35521 000030FD 5E                      	pop	si
 35522 000030FE 07                      	pop	es
 35523                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35524 000030FF 58                      	pop	ax
 35525                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35526                                  	; cf = 0
 35527                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35528                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35529 00003100 C3                      	retn
 35530

 35569                                  
 35570                                  todigit:

 35572                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 35573                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35574 00003131 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 35575                                  	;cmp	al,9
 35576                                  	;ja	short notdig
 35577                                  	;clc
 35578                                  	;retn
 35579                                  	; 12/12/2022

 35581 00003135 F5                      	cmc

 35587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35588                                  ;
 35589                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35590                                  ;
 35591                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35592                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35593                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35594                                  ;
 35595                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35596                                  
 35597                                  getnum:
 35598 00003137 53                      	push	bx
 35599 00003138 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35600                                  b2:
 35601 0000313A E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35602 0000313D 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35603                                  
 35604 0000313F 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35605 00003140 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35606                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35607                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35608 00003141 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35609 00003143 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35610 00003145 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35611 00003146 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35612 00003148 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35613 0000314B 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35614                                  
 35615 0000314D 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35616                                  
 35617 0000314E E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35618 00003151 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35619 00003153 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35620 00003155 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35621 00003157 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35622 00003159 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35623 0000315B 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35624 0000315D 7417                    	je	short b15
 35625 0000315F 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35626 00003164 7410                    	je	short b15
 35627 00003166 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35628                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35629                                  	;nop
 35630                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35631                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35632                                  	;nop
 35633                                  	;nop
 35634 00003168 740C                    	je	short b15
 35635 0000316A 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 35636 0000316C 7408                    	je	short b15
 35637 0000316E 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35638 00003170 7404                    	je	short b15
 35639 00003172 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 35640 00003174 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 35641                                  b15:
 35642 00003176 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 35643 0000317B 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 35644                                  b1:
 35645 00003180 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 35646 00003182 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 35647 00003184 5B                      	pop	bx
 35648 00003185 C3                      	retn
 35649                                  badnum:
 35650                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35651                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35652 00003186 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 35653                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 35654 00003188 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 35655 0000318C 5B                      	pop	bx
 35656 0000318D F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 35657 0000318E C3                      	retn
 35658                                  
 35659                                  ;****************************************************************************
 35660                                  
 35661                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 35662                                  
 35663                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35664                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 35665                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 35666                                  ;	si = 0
 35667                                  ;	ax = country id
 35668                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 35669                                  ;	bx = file handle
 35670                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 35671                                  ;
 35672                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 35673                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 35674                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 35675                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 35676                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35677                                  
 35678 0000318F 57                      	push	di
 35679 00003190 50                      	push	ax
 35680 00003191 52                      	push	dx
 35681                                  
 35682 00003192 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 35683 00003194 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 35684 00003196 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 35685 00003199 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 35686 0000319C 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35687                                  
 35688 0000319E 06                      	push	es
 35689 0000319F 56                      	push	si
 35690                                  
 35691 000031A0 0E                      	push	cs
 35692 000031A1 07                      	pop	es
 35693                                  
 35694 000031A2 BF[4B34]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 35695 000031A5 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 35696 000031A8 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 35697                                  
 35698 000031AA 5E                      	pop	si
 35699 000031AB 07                      	pop	es
 35700 000031AC 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 35701                                  
 35702 000031AE 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 35703 000031B1 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 35704 000031B4 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 35705                                  
 35706 000031B6 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 35707 000031B7 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 35708 000031B9 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 35709 000031BC B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 35710 000031BF E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 35711 000031C2 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35712                                  
 35713 000031C4 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 35714 000031C6 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 35715 000031CA 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35716                                  
 35717 000031CC 46                      	inc	si
 35718 000031CD 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 35719 000031CE 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 35720 000031CF 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 35721 000031D0 5F                      	pop	di
 35722                                  
 35723                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 35724 000031D1 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 35725 000031D4 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 35726                                  
 35727 000031D6 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 35728 000031D9 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 35729 000031DB 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 35730 000031DE 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 35731                                  
 35732                                  setdoscntry_next:
 35733 000031E0 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 35734 000031E2 46                      	inc	si
 35735 000031E3 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 35736 000031E4 E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 35737                                  
 35738 000031E6 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 35739                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 35740 000031E9 F9                      	stc
 35741 000031EA C3                      	retn
 35742                                  
 35743                                  setdosdata_fail:
 35744 000031EB 5E                      	pop	si
 35745 000031EC 59                      	pop	cx
 35746 000031ED 5F                      	pop	di
 35747 000031EE EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 35748                                  
 35749                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 35750 000031F0 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 35751                                  
 35752                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 35753 000031F3 2E8916[5334]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 35754 000031F8 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 35755 000031FB 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 35756 000031FE B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 35757 00003201 E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 35758 00003204 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 35759                                  
 35760 00003206 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 35761 00003208 46                      	inc	si
 35762 00003209 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 35763                                  
 35764                                  setdoscntry_data:
 35765 0000320A 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 35766 0000320B 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 35767 0000320C 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 35768                                  
 35769 0000320D 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 35770 00003210 E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 35771 00003213 727D                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 35772                                  
 35773 00003215 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 35774 00003218 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 35775 0000321B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 35776 0000321E F9                      	stc
 35777 0000321F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 35778 00003221 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35779                                  
 35780 00003223 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 35781 00003226 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 35782 00003229 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 35783 0000322B F9                      	stc
 35784 0000322C CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 35785 0000322E 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 35786                                  
 35787 00003230 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 35788 00003232 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 35789                                  
 35790 00003234 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 35791 00003237 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 35792 0000323A B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 35793 0000323D F9                      	stc
 35794 0000323E CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 35795 00003240 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35796                                  
 35797 00003242 56                      	push	si
 35798 00003243 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 35799 00003246 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 35800 00003248 5E                      	pop	si
 35801 00003249 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 35802 0000324C 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 35803 0000324F B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 35804 00003251 F9                      	stc
 35805 00003252 CD21                    	int	21h
 35806 00003254 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35807                                  
 35808 00003256 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 35809 00003258 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 35810                                  
 35811 0000325A 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 35812 0000325D BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 35813 00003260 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 35814 00003262 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 35815 00003263 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 35816 00003264 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 35817 00003268 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35818                                  
 35819                                  	;if	bugfix
 35820 0000326A E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 35821                                  	;endif
 35822                                  
 35823 0000326D 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 35824 0000326F 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 35825                                  
 35826 00003271 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 35827                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 35828 00003275 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 35829                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 35830                                  	
 35831 00003279 57                      	push	di			;save di
 35832                                  
 35833 0000327A 50                      	push	ax
 35834 0000327B 2EA1[5334]              	mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 35835 0000327F 894404                  	mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 35836 00003282 58                      	pop	ax
 35837                                  
 35838                                  setdoscntry_mov:

 35840 00003285 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?

 35842                                  
 35843 00003289 5F                      	pop	di			;restore di
 35844 0000328A 268F451A                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]
 35845                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 35846 0000328E 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 35847                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 35848                                  
 35849                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 35850 00003292 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 35851 00003293 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 35852 00003294 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 35853 00003295 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 35854 00003297 46                      	inc	si
 35855 00003298 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 35856 00003299 49                      	dec	cx
 35857 0000329A 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 35858 0000329D 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 35859 0000329F E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 35860                                  
 35861                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35862                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 35863                                  	;retn

 35867                                  	;if	bugfix
 35868                                  
 35869                                  setdbcs_before_copy:
 35870 000032A2 3C07                    	cmp	al,SetDBCS ; 7		; dbcs vector set?
 35871 000032A4 7516                    	jne	short sdbcsbc		; jump if not
 35872 000032A6 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 35873 000032AA 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so
 35874                                  
 35875 000032AC 57                      	push	di
 35876 000032AD 50                      	push	ax
 35877 000032AE 51                      	push	cx
 35878 000032AF 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		; load block length
 35879 000032B2 83C702                  	add	di,2			; points actual data
 35880 000032B5 30C0                    	xor	al,al			; fill bytes
 35881 000032B7 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; clear data block
 35882 000032B9 59                      	pop	cx
 35883 000032BA 58                      	pop	ax
 35884 000032BB 5F                      	pop	di

 35892                                  
 35893                                  getcountrydestination:
 35894                                  
 35895                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 35896                                  ;input: al - data id
 35897                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 35898                                  ;on return:
 35899                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 35900                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 35901                                  
 35902 000032BD 51                      	push	cx
 35903                                  	;add	di,74
 35904 000032BE 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 35905                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 35906 000032C1 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 35907 000032C4 47                      	inc	di
 35908 000032C5 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 35909                                  
 35910                                  getcntrydest:
 35911 000032C6 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 35912 000032C9 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 35913 000032CB 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 35914 000032CF 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 35915                                  
 35916 000032D1 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 35917 000032D4 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 35918                                  
 35919                                  getcntrydest_1:
 35920                                  	;add	di,41
 35921 000032D6 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 35922                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 35923 000032D9 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 35924 000032DB F9                      	stc
 35925 000032DC EB0B                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 35926                                  
 35927                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 35928 000032DE 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 35929 000032E0 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 35930                                  
 35931 000032E2 47                      	inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 35932 000032E3 EB04                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 35933                                  
 35934                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 35935 000032E5 26C47D01                	les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 35936                                  
 35937                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 35938 000032E9 59                      	pop	cx
 35939 000032EA C3                      	retn

 35942                                  
 35943                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 35944                                  
 35945                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 35946                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 35947                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 35948                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 35949                                  ;	 be moved.
 35950                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 35951                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 35952                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 35953                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 35954                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 35955                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 35956                                  
 35957 000032EB 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 35958 000032EC B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 35959 000032EF F9                      	stc
 35960 000032F0 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 35961 000032F2 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 35962 000032F3 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 35963                                  
 35964 000032F5 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 35965 000032F7 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 35966 000032F9 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 35967 000032FB F9                      	stc
 35968 000032FC CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 35969                                  ricb_exit:
 35970 000032FE C3                      	retn
 35971                                  
 35972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35973                                  
 35974                                  set_country_path:
 35975                                  
 35976                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 35977                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 35978                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 35979                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 35980                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 35981                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 35982                                  
 35983 000032FF 56                      	push	si
 35984                                  
 35985 00003300 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 35986 00003301 06                      	push	es
 35987 00003302 1F                      	pop	ds
 35988 00003303 07                      	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 35989                                  
 35990 00003304 E82E00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 35991 00003307 7206                    	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 35992                                  
 35993 00003309 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 35994 0000330B 46                      	inc	si
 35995 0000330C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 35996 0000330D EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 35997                                  
 35998                                  scp_default_drv:
 35999 0000330F B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36000 00003311 CD21                    	int	21h
 36001 00003313 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36002                                  
 36003                                  scp_setdrv:
 36004 00003315 2EA2[0834]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36005 00003319 BF[0B34]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36006 0000331C 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36007 0000331E 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36008 00003320 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36009                                  
 36010 00003322 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36011 00003324 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36012                                  
 36013 00003326 EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 36014                                  
 36015                                  scp_root_dir:
 36016 00003328 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 36017                                  scp_path:
 36018 00003329 E81F00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 36019                                  
 36020 0000332C BF[0834]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36021                                  scpath_exit:
 36022                                  
 36023 0000332F 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36024 00003330 06                      	push	es
 36025 00003331 1F                      	pop	ds
 36026 00003332 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36027                                  
 36028 00003333 5E                      	pop	si
 36029 00003334 C3                      	retn
 36030                                  
 36031                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36032                                  
 36033                                  chk_drive_letter:
 36034                                  
 36035                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 36036                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36037                                  ;carry set if not.
 36038                                  
 36039 00003335 50                      	push	ax
 36040 00003336 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 36041                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 36042 00003339 720E                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 36043 0000333B 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 36044 0000333E 7708                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 36045 00003340 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 36046 00003344 7502                    	jne	short cdletter_no
 36047                                  
 36048 00003346 EB01                    	jmp	short cdletter_exit
 36049                                  
 36050                                  cdletter_no:
 36051 00003348 F9                      	stc
 36052                                  cdletter_exit:
 36053 00003349 58                      	pop	ax
 36054 0000334A C3                      	retn

 36058                                  move_asciiz:
 36059                                  
 36060                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 36061                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 36062                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 36063                                  
 36064                                  masciiz_loop:

 36066 0000334C 807CFF00                	cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 36067 00003350 75F9                    	jne	short masciiz_loop
